name: Just Shapes and Beeps
description:
Controls:

W, A, S, D to Move.  Escape to Pause.  W, S, and D/Enter to navigate the Pause menu.

In this game, you cannot control when you where your gun shoots.  Every 5 seconds, it will go of in whatever direction it is facing.  You must dodge and/or defeat the Red Triangular enemies, and collect the Green Friendly Boxes.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK game Jam 2020.  All Art, Coding, Level Design, and Music was made by me (theyellowgreninja).  The SFX were made in part by bfxr.net, a free online service for randomly generating sound effects.

Some of the making of this game was streamed on my twitch channel: twitch.tv/theyellowgreninja.  However, my headset broke halfway through Day 2, so I couldn't stream the rest.
